cab.content:
Colonel Jones (This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
G.T. 4936.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - JUNE 24th, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
The Situation is unchanged.
2. ITALIAN FRONT.
No further news has been received since today's noon Battle Situation was issued.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
24th June, 1918.
Issued at 6.40 p.m.
